en-US.summary: A hilarious list of truth or dare challenges
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Truth or Dare for a truth
Alexa, ask Truth or Dare for a dare
en-US.name: Truth or Dare
en-US.description:
A hilarious list of truth or dare challenges. Content is frequently updated, so tune back in. 

To play, sit in a circle and decide on a starting player. That player must ask Alexa for a truth, or a dare. If they don't do what was assigned to them... They're out! Last person still in the circle wins.

*** New truths and dares just added

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: {"ask_dist_username":"","ask_dist_password":"","ask_dist_testing_instructions":"Ask for a truth or a dare. All content is PG. You'll get an offer to subscribe about 30% of the time unless you've already subscribed, the user is less than 12 hours old, or it's been 5 minutes since the last offer.\n\nAds are presented in the en-US locale unless the user is less than 12 hours old or is subscribed."}
